sentences.en: A lot of people looked on him as a healer.
sentences.cn: 很多人视他为信仰疗法术士。

sentences.en: As a healer of bodies I had scant success.
sentences.cn: 作为治疗肌体的医生,我的成就甚微.

sentences.en: As a healer of the spirit I have succeeded beyond my hopes and my deserts.
sentences.cn: 作为医治精神疾病的医生,我的成就超越了自己的期望与功德.

sentences.en: Healer's Focus – Healing by spells increases, but avoidance ability decreases.
sentences.cn: 治疗姿态–技能治疗效果提升, 不过闪避能力下降.

sentences.en: Helen was probably best known in Scarborough as a healer of animals.
sentences.cn: 海伦可能是斯卡伯勒最出名的兽医.

sentences.en: I know that you're not a killer. You're a healer.
sentences.cn: 我知道你不是个杀人犯, 你是个治愈者.

sentences.en: Most crystal healing is guided to the healer by Spirit.
sentences.cn: 治疗者用精神方法指导大多数的水晶治疗.

sentences.en: My reputation as a healer is undeserved.
sentences.cn: 我能治百病的传闻是名不副实的.

sentences.en: Natural force within us is the true healer of disease.
sentences.cn: 我们体内的自然力量是疾病的真正治疗者.

sentences.en: Noah : No, you're still a healer. You can do both.
sentences.cn: 不, 你仍然可以治愈的, 你拥有两种能力.

sentences.en: The dark water of the true gulf is the greatest healer that there is.
sentences.cn: 这真正的海湾中的深暗的水是世上最佳的治疗剂.

sentences.en: The healer heals all standard damage for your company as well.
sentences.cn: 治疗者也治疗你军队的一般伤害.

sentences.en: The Healer protects the survival of the team from damage.
sentences.cn: 治疗者保护团队在受到伤害下生存.

sentences.en: This ancestor may have been a healer or medicine man or woman.
sentences.cn: 这名祖先可能会是一名疗愈者,或者男性或女性巫医.

sentences.en: Work is the best balm, the best healer.
sentences.cn: 工作是最好的镇痛剂, 最佳的康复治疗.

trans.tran_cn: 医治者，治疗物，治病术士
trans.tran_en: A healer is a person who heals people, especially a person who heals through prayer and religious faith
